backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated file paths, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for numerous frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with boot‑fallback UI and metadata for loading the frontend application.
frontend/public/health.html: Standalone health‑check page showing build info, system status, and guidance messaging.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring ThemeProvider, Web3Provider, layout structure, and dispatching an app-mounted event.
frontend/src/components/AddCustomTokenFo: Form component allowing users to add custom ERC‑20 tokens with metadata lookup, validation, and saving.
frontend/src/components/BalanceView.tsx: Displays vault balances with refresh controls, live update toggling, metadata cache management, and valuation data handling.
frontend/src/components/BuildExportButto: Provides a button to export the project as a ZIP file with progress messaging and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ContractInfo.tsx: Shows contract address, network details, and available smart‑contract functions with copy and BscScan link actions.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Handles depositing BNB or tokens into the vault, including validation, transactions, and history logging.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsBar.t: Displays build and environment info and allows copying diagnostics and performance data to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches runtime errors and shows an error screen with details, reload options, and troubleshooting tips.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders app footer with build metadata, branding, export button, and external attribution links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation header with app branding, wallet connect, and a theme toggle button.
frontend/src/components/TokenSelectorInp: Provides a token input and selector UI with search, manual entry mode, metadata display, and token management actions.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays transaction history with status indicators, selection controls, deletion, and sharing support for WhatsApp and Telegram.
frontend/src/components/VaultBalancesTab: Shows vault token balances, BNB valuation, token valuations, and error states for missing or failed token data.
frontend/src/components/WalletBalancesTa: Displays connected wallet token balances with valuations and token labels derived from the saved catalog.
frontend/src/components/WalletBalancesVi: Wraps wallet balance loading, refresh controls, live update toggling, and renders the wallet balances table.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnect.ts: UI component managing wallet connection, network switching, and mobile-specific MetaMask instructions using useWeb3.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectTop: Top-bar wallet status component showing connection, network state, and actions for connecting or switching to BSC.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawalDestin: Selector allowing users to choose owner or custom withdrawal address with validation.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: Form for withdrawing BNB or tokens with validation, transaction handling, and history logging.
frontend/src/global.d.ts: Type definitions extending window.ethereum for EVM wallet interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
Fetches and calculates USD and BNB valuations for BNB and token balances with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook file exporting nothing.
Manages a persistent token label catalog in localStorage, including seeding defaults, upserting labels, and generating fallback names.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenMetadataCache: Caches token metadata in localStorage with versioning, providing get/set/clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTxHistory.ts: Stores and updates transaction history in localStorage and polls for receipt confirmations via provider or RPC.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultBalances.ts: Fetches BNB and token balances using contract calls with fallbacks, tracks metadata, live updates, and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultInfo.ts: Fetches and exposes the vault owner address via a contract call with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultOperations.ts: Provides deposit and withdrawal operations for the vault, handling approvals, transactions, and state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletBalances.ts: Fetches BNB and watched ERC20 token balances for the connected BSC wallet with caching, polling control, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchedTokens.ts: Manages a persistent list of validated token addresses with localStorage syncing and add/remove utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3.tsx: Provides Web3 context for wallet connection, chain switching, contract calls, and native balance retrieval.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/appBranding.ts: Stores app branding constants and helpers for names, identifiers, and tagline.
frontend/src/lib/buildExport.ts: Creates a downloadable ZIP of project sources by gathering backend, frontend, and config files.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exposes build version, date, and identifier from environment variables with a fallback lookup.
frontend/src/lib/contracts.ts: Contains contract method signatures and utilities to encode and decode EVM contract calls.
frontend/src/lib/defaultBscTokens.ts: Lists default BSC token addresses and labels used to seed the watched token list.
frontend/src/lib/evm.ts: Provides BigInt-based EVM encoding/decoding utilities and address/units helpers without ethers.js.
frontend/src/lib/evmAbiText.ts: Decodes ABI-encoded strings and ERC‑20 metadata in a browser-safe way using TextDecoder.
frontend/src/lib/exportSourceManifest.ts: Collects deterministic backend and frontend source files and generates an export README.
frontend/src/lib/performanceCheck.ts: Gathers build and browser performance timing data and formats it for display or clipboard export.
frontend/src/lib/prices.ts: Fetches BNB and known token prices from CoinGecko and formats numeric price output.
frontend/src/lib/tokenDisplay.ts: Generates consistent token display labels with fallbacks and address shortening utilities.
frontend/src/lib/txHistoryShare.ts: Formats transaction history entries for sharing and builds share URLs for WhatsApp and Telegram.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a Tailwind‑aware class name merge helper.
frontend/src/lib/zipCrc32.ts: Implements a CRC32 checksum generator using a lookup table for ZIP creation.
frontend/src/lib/zipWriter.ts: Implements an in-browser ZIP writer that builds uncompressed ZIP files with correct headers and CRC32 checksums.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry rendering the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard UI handling wallet connection state, BSC network checks, balances, and deposit/withdraw operations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and content paths for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, features, and requirements for implementing ZIP export and regeneration logic.
